title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1112/2004 of 14 June 2004 amending Regulation (EC) No 1096/2004 fixing the export refunds in the milk and milk products sector
header:
15.6.2004 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 213/4
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1112/2004
of 14 June 2004
amending Regulation (EC) No 1096/2004 fixing the export refunds in the milk and milk products sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organization of the market in milk and milk products (1), and in particular Article 31(3) thereof,
Whereas:
main_body:
In the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1096/2004, the amount of refund for product codes 0401 30 31 9100 are replaced by the following:
Product code Destination Unit of measurement Amount of refund
0401 30 31 9100 L02 EUR/100 kg 20,79

This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 June 2004.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 June 2004.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48. Regulation as last amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 186/2004 (OJ L 29, 3.2.2004, p. 6).
(2)  OJ L 209, 11.6.2004, p. 15.
